EmailTemplate.name: SW: Found for L5 w/o known SW
EmailTemplate.subject: SW found for L5 w/o a previously known SW
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
Please see {!Contact.Name}'s account. A support worker has now been found for them; {!Contact.00NC0000005GCVH}.
Click on the link to view the record {!Contact.Link}
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever a SW is found for someone without a previously known Support worker.
